verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
How great our joy! Great our joy!
Joy, joy, joy!
Joy, joy, joy!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Praise we the Lord in heaven on high!
Praise we the Lord in heaven on high!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: While by the sheep we watched at night,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Glad tidings brought an angel bright.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: There shall be born so He did say,

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: There shall the Child lie in a stall,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: This Child who shall redeem us all.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines: This gift of God we'll cherish well,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines: That every joy our hearts shall fill.
